speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0389/2008 ) by Mrs Bauer, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, with recommendations to the Commission on the application of the principle of equal pay for men and women ( 2008/2012(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0389/2008 ) by Mrs Bauer, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, with recommendations to the Commission on the application of the principle of equal pay for men and women ( 2008/2012(INI) ).
agenda_item: Application of the principle of equal pay for men and women (debate)
